column5: there was a fire burning along Street 172
column10: Phnom Penh.------The 3m x 4m room was being rented by a foreign man aged 56 (named in link).------The cause was a power outage
column11: which destroyed items inside the room
column12: but caused no unjuries and the fire was contained before it spread.------In this case
column13: three fire station vehicles used 8 cubic meters of water
column14: and extinguished the fire at 23:50. ------POST NEWS
